note.p: Career: Alderman of the Cordwainers' Ward; member of the Haberdashers Company, Sheriff 1720, Alderman 1722, Lord Mayor of London (1734); died of dropsy or jaundice
Freemason, member, 1723, 1725, unnamed and unnumbered Lodge at Rummer Tavern, Charing Cross, London
'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Masons' Library and Museum of Freemasonry', 2010, page 9-10
